column1: Little Goat Diner////We asked the waitress if she could take a look
column2: and that's when our dining experience started to take a turn.  She told us she wasn't sure if that's how it should look
column3: but it was probably ok.  My sister decided to ask to have it cooked more
column5: our service at Little Goat got pretty bad.  We saw our waitress one more time (when she brought our bill)
column6: and she would walk by our table and try to not look at us. For fifteen minutes.  Another waitress brought the reheated plate of food (it took 15 minutes)
